Posted By: TheWrathofShane (10/17/2011 5:35:21 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
This was my very first legendary. only latter discovered how small a character she was. Seriously, you have to dig, deep, to find anything on this lady.  
  
I recently designed an enchantment/Draw Deck around her. It's... Either very nasty or rather useless depending on your first hand...  
  
As for her, she's better than I thought. Against blue, red, or black she's usually quite nice, being that those are the colors that like to meddle with the opponent's deck.  
  
Against white, it really depends...  
As for green though... Not really.
posts.html:
This was my very first legendary. only latter discovered how small a character she was. Seriously, you have to dig, deep, to find anything on this lady.

I recently designed an enchantment/Draw Deck around her. It's... Either very nasty or rather useless depending on your first hand...

As for her, she's better than I thought. Against blue, red, or black she's usually quite nice, being that those are the colors that like to meddle with the opponent's deck.

Against white, it really depends...
As for green though... Not really.
